title: iPhone Wireless Hardware Engineering Program Manager (India)
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — we craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it! We invite you to join Apple's growing iPhone Wireless Hardware Engineering Program Management group.
description:
-  Work closely with wireless development teams early in the product development lifecycle to implement wireless designs at both circuit board level and system level
-  Responsible for driving the project build plans and build material preparation
-  Be the main point of contact between Apple and Contract Manufacturers for wireless tests, wireless materials, and factory processes
-  Responsible for all aspects of wireless test line readiness, wireless test line flow, and driving test issue resolution
-  Drive teams for failure / root cause analysis and implement corrective action measures
-  Communicate wireless design status, test status, and corrective actions to technical staff and executive management in a clear and concise manner
-  Work closely with Operations to ensure smooth transition from development to mass production
-  Ability to deal with dynamic and constantly evolving environment
-  Ability to travel - domestic & international (up to 35%)
key_qualifications:
5+ years of technical experience in wireless communications
Wireless hardware design/architecture experience in Cellular, WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS, UWB, or NFC
Project management experience in hardware development and integration of wireless technologies into products
Excellent organizational, interpersonal, presentation, and communication skills
Eager to collaborate and be part of a team
education_experience: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering or related field required. M.Tech degree preferred, but not required
